title.rendered: Market Leader Participates in Keller Williams’ Annual RED DAY Today!

content.rendered:
Good morning! Today we are joining the local Keller Williams market center here in Kirkland, WA in their RED Day efforts.

What is RED day? For Keller Williams, “RED (Renew, Energize and Donate) Day is a Keller Williams Realty service initiative dedicated to improving our local communities. All Keller Williams Realty associates in the United States and Canada were asked to donate their time on May 13, 2010 to renewing and energizing aspects of their local communities. Because of her constant commitment to the culture of our company, this day has been dedicated in honor of our Vice Chairman, Mo Anderson.” 

We are excited about this opportunity to serve the Kirkland Boys and Girls Club  and are proud to be wearing our Keller Williams’ RED Day shirts. Stop by and say “hello” if you’re in the neighborhood!
